Author: Albert Einstein

Quotes: When you give joy to other people, you get more joy in return. You should give a good thought to happiness that you can give out

Quotes: It is only when we take chances, when our lives improve. The initial and the most difficult risk that we need to take is to become honest

Author: Mister Rogers
Quotes: There are three ways to ultimate success: The first way is to be kind. The second way is to be kind. The third way is to be kind

Quotes: You learn more from failure than from success. Don’t let it stop you. Failure builds character

Quotes: I’m a greater believer in luck, and I find the harder I work the more I have of it

Quotes: It’s not about better time management. It’s about better life management

Quotes: Alone we can do so little, together we can do so much

Quotes: Small is not just a stepping-stone. Small is a great destination itself

Quotes: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance you must keep moving

Quotes: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them

Quotes: Don’t limit yourself. Many people limit themselves to what they think they can do. You can go as far as your mind lets you. What you believe, remember, you can achieve

Quotes: It’s only after you’ve stepped outside your comfort zone that you begin to change, grow, and transform

Author: Roy T. Bennett The Light in the Heart
Quotes: More smiling, less worrying. More compassion, less judgment. More blessed, less stressed. More love, less hate

Author: Roy T. Bennett The Light in the Heart
Quotes:
Keep Going
Your hardest times often lead to the greatest moments of your life. Keep going. Tough situations build strong people in the end

Author: Roy T. Bennett The Light in the Heart
Quotes: Pursue what catches your heart, not what catches your eyes

Author: Lou Holtz
Quotes: It's not the load that breaks you down, it's the way you carry it

Author: Roy T. Bennett The Light in the Heart
Quotes: Start each day with a positive thought and a grateful heart

Author: Roy T. Bennett The Light in the Heart
Quotes: Be grateful for what you already have while you pursue your goals.

Author: Roy T. Bennett The Light in the Heart
Quotes: If you aren’t grateful for what you already have, what makes you think you would be happy with more

Author: Roy T. Bennett The Light in the Heart
Quotes: Life is about accepting the challenges along the way, choosing to keep moving forward, and savoring the journey

Author: Roy T. Bennett The Light in the Heart
Quotes: Be brave to stand for what you believe in even if you stand alone

Author: Roy T. Bennett The Light in the Heart
Quotes: Great things happen to those who don't stop believing, trying, learning, and being grateful

Author: Viktor E. Frankl
Quotes: When we are no longer able to change a situation, we are challenged to change ourselves

Author: Roy T. Bennett The Light in the Heart
Quotes: Never lose hope. Storms make people stronger and never last forever

Author: Roy T. Bennett The Light in the Heart
Quotes: Do not fear failure but rather fear not trying

Author: Thomas Jefferson
Quotes: Do you want to know who you are? Don't ask. Act! Action will delineate and define you

Author: Paulo Coelho Brida
Quotes: Nothing in the world is ever completely wrong. Even a stopped clock is right twice a day

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quotes: You never change your life until you step out of your comfort zone; change begins at the end of your comfort zone

Author: Roy T. Bennett The Light in the Heart
Quotes: Do not let the memories of your past limit the potential of your future. There are no limits to what you can achieve on your journey through life, except in your mind

Author: Roy T. Bennett The Light in the Heart
Quotes: Let the improvement of yourself keep you so busy that you have no time to criticize others

Author: Zig Ziglar Raising Positive Kids in a Negative World
Quotes: Of course motivation is not permanent. But then, neither is bathing; but it is something you should do on a regular basis

Author: Walt Disney
Quotes: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing

Author: Roy T. Bennett The Light in the Heart
Quotes: Believe in your infinite potential. Your only limitations are those you set upon yourself

Author: Jordan Belfort
Quotes: The only thing standing between you and your goal is the bullshit story you keep telling yourself as to why you can't achieve it

Author: Roy T. Bennett The Light in the Heart
Quotes: Be Brave and Take Risks: You need to have faith in yourself. Be brave and take risks. You don't have to have it all figured out to move forward

Author: Roy T. Bennett The Light in the Heart
Quotes: Surround yourself with people who believe in your dreams, encourage your ideas, support your ambitions, and bring out the best in you

Author: Roy T. Bennett The Light in the Heart
Quotes: Do what you love, love what you do, and with all your heart give yourself to it

Author: Babe Ruth
Quotes: It’s hard to beat a person who never gives up

Author: Leah Busque
Quotes: I wake up every morning and think to myself, ‘how far can I push this company in the next 24 hours

Quotes: If people are doubting how far you can go, go so far that you can’t hear them anymore

Quotes: We need to accept that we won’t always make the right decisions, that we’ll screw up royally sometimes – understanding that failure is not the opposite of success, it’s part of success

Quotes: Write it. Shoot it. Publish it. Crochet it, sauté it, whatever. MAKE

Quotes: Fairy tales are more than true: not because they tell us that dragons exist, but because they tell us that dragons can be beaten

Author: Pablo Picasso
Quotes: Everything you can imagine is real

Quotes: When one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us

Quotes: Do one thing every day that scares you

Author: Lewis Carroll
Quotes: It’s no use going back to yesterday, because I was a different person then

Quotes: Smart people learn from everything and everyone, average people from their experiences, stupid people already have all the answers

Author: Eleanor Roosevelt
Quotes: Do what you feel in your heart to be right – for you’ll be criticized anyway

Author: Dalai Lama XIV
Quotes: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions

Author: Abraham Lincoln
Quotes: Whatever you are, be a good one

Quotes: The same boiling water that softens the potato hardens the egg. It’s what you’re made of. Not the circumstances

Quotes: If we have the attitude that it’s going to be a great day it usually is

Quotes: You can either experience the pain of discipline or the pain of regret. The choice is yours

Quotes: “Impossible is just an opinion

Quotes: Magic is believing in yourself. If you can make that happen, you can make anything happen

Quotes: You can waste your lives drawing lines. Or you can live your life crossing them

Quotes: You’ve got to get up every morning with determination if you’re going to go to bed with satisfaction

Author: Michelle Obama
Quotes: I now tried a new hypothesis: It was possible that I was more in charge of my happiness than I was allowing myself to be

Quotes: In a gentle way, you can shake the world

Quotes: If opportunity doesn’t knock, build a door

Quotes: Don’t be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart

Author: Frank Ocean
Quotes: Work hard in silence, let your success be the noise.

Quotes: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn’t work hard

Author: Mario Andretti
Quotes: If everything seems to be under control, you’re not going fast enough

Author: Jimmy Johnson
Quotes: The only difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra

Author: Oscar Wilde

Quotes: Unsuccessful people make their decisions based on their current situations. Successful people make their decisions based on where they want to be

Author: Kamari aka Lyrikal
Quotes: Never stop doing your best just because someone doesn’t give you credit

Author: Leah LaBelle
Quotes: Work hard for what you want because it won’t come to you without a fight. You have to be strong and courageous and know that you can do anything you put your mind to. If somebody puts you down or criticizes you, just keep on believing in yourself and turn it into something positive

Author: Conan O’Brien
Quotes: Work hard, be kind, and amazing things will happen

Author: Albert Einstein
Quotes: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity

Author: Unknown
Quotes: Don’t quit yet, the worst moments are usually followed by the most beautiful silver linings. You have to stay strong, remember to keep your head up and remain hopeful

Quotes: When written in Chinese the word “crisis” is composed of two characters – one represents danger and the other represents opportunity

Quotes: Keep your face always toward the sunshine – and shadows will fall behind you

Author: Lionel from Maid in Manhattan Movie
Quotes: What defines us is how well we rise after falling

Author: Unknown
Quotes: H.O.P.E. = Hold On. Pain Ends

Quotes: Make each day your masterpiece

Quotes: Wherever you go, go with all your heart

Author: Oprah
Quotes: Turn your wounds into wisdom

Author: Helen Keller
Quotes: We can do anything we want to if we stick to it long enough

Author: John Cage
Quotes: Begin anywhere

Author: Katharine Hepburn
Quotes: If you obey all the rules, you miss all the fun

Author: Herb Brooks
Quotes: You were born to be a player. You were meant to be here. This moment is yours

Author: Frank Herbert
Quotes: must not fear. Fear is the mind-killer. Fear is the little-death that brings total obliteration. I will face my fear. I will permit it to pass over me and through me. And when it has gone past I will turn the inner eye to see its path. Where the fear has gone there will be nothing. Only I will remain

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quotes: Attitude is a choice. Happiness is a choice. Optimism is a choice. Kindness is a choice. Giving is a choice. Respect is a choice. Whatever choice you make makes you. Choose wisely

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quotes: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quotes: Live the Life of Your Dreams: Be brave enough to live the life of your dreams according to your vision and purpose instead of the expectations and opinions of others

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quotes: Believe in yourself. You are braver than you think, more talented than you know, and capable of more than you imagine

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quotes: s only after youâve stepped outside your comfort zone that you begin to change, grow, and transform

Quotes: The truth is, unless you let go, unless you forgive yourself, unless you forgive the situation, unless you realize that the situation is over, you cannot move forward

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quotes: Do what is right, not what is easy nor what is popular

Author: Steve Maraboli
Quotes: Dare to Be

Quotes: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quotes: Be grateful for what you already have while you pursue your goals

Author: Steve Maraboli
Quotes: Letting go means to come to the realization that some people are a part of your history, but not a part of your destiny

Quotes: Lack of direction, not lack of time, is the problem. We all have twenty-four hour days

Author: Steve Maraboli

Author: Confucius
Quotes: The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones

Quotes: The only way of discovering the limits of the possible is to venture a little way past them into the impossible

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quotes: Surround Yourself with People Who Believe in Your Dreams
